titleStmt.title: The respondents ansvver to a printed paper, called, The Dutchess of Albemarl, and Mr. Monk's case against the said respondents
titleStmt.author: Bath, John Grenville, Earl of, 1628-1701. aut

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Ralph, Earl of Mountague, Elizabeth, Dutchess of Albemarl, his wife, and Mr. Monk. Appel. John Earl of Bathe, and others. Resp.
The words "Ralph, .. Monk." and "John .. others." are bracketed together on title page.
Print faded with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
